function globe(t,w,nw) {
  
  LAT=75;
  LAT2=2*LAT;

  #system("tput clear");
  system("tput cup 0 0");
  system("tput setaf 2");

  split("", wm);

  i=1;
  st=1;
  while(i<=nw) {
   if (st) {
     st=0;
     py=0+w[i];
     px=0+w[i+1];
     on=1;
     i+=2;
   } else {
     st=1;
     s=w[i];
     slen=length(s);
     j=1;
     while(j<=slen){
      tok=substr(s,j,1);
      if(tok=="S"){len=0+substr(s,j+1,3); j+=4;}
      else if (tok=="T"){len=0+substr(s,j+1,2); j+=3;}
      else {len=0+tok;j++;}
      if (on) {
        for(x=px;x<px+len;++x){
          wy=int(H-(py+LAT)/LAT2*H);
          wx=int(((x+180+t)%360)/360*W);
          wm[wy " " wx] = ":";
          #print py, px, wy, wx;
        }
      }
      px+=len;
      on=1-on;
     }
     i++;
     
   }
  }

  #n=split("KEF 64.0 -22.6 YQX 48.9 -54.6 YVR 49.2 -123.2 YYZ 43.7 -79.6 LOS 6.6 3.3 TUN 36.9 10.2 BRU 50.9 4.5 FRA 50.0 8.6 DUS 51.3 6.8 MUC 48.4 11.8 TXL 52.6 13.3 HEL 60.3 25.0 MAN 53.4 -2.3 LGW 51.1 -0.2 LHR 51.5 -0.5 STN 51.9 0.2 AMS 52.3 4.8 DUB 53.4 -6.3 CPH 55.6 12.7 OSL 60.1 11.1 KRK 50.1 19.8 ARN 59.7 17.9 CPT -34.0 18.6 JNB -26.1 28.2 LAD -8.9 13.2 CMN 33.4 -7.6 ADD 9.0 38.8 CAI 30.1 31.4 BCN 41.3 2.1 MAD 40.5 -3.6 CDG 49.0 2.5 ORY 48.7 2.4 CTA 37.5 15.1 MXP 45.6 8.7 FCO 41.8 12.2 MLA 35.9 14.5 VIE 48.1 16.6 LIS 38.8 -9.1 ZRH 47.5 8.5 AYT 36.9 30.8 MEX 19.4 -99.1 AKL -37.0 174.8 JED 21.7 39.2 RUH 25.0 46.7 DXB 25.3 55.4 TPE 25.1 121.2 NRT 35.8 140.4 CTS 42.8 141.7 FUK 33.6 130.5 HND 35.6 139.8 CJU 33.5 126.5 GMP 37.6 126.8 MNL 14.5 121.0 AEP -34.6 -58.4 USH -54.8 -68.3 BSB -15.9 -47.9 GIG -22.8 -43.3 GRU -23.4 -46.5 CGH -23.6 -46.7 SCL -33.4 -70.8 BOG 4.7 -74.1 LIM -12.0 -77.1 MVD -34.8 -56.0 CCS 10.6 -67.0 VVO 43.4 132.1 LED 59.8 30.3 SVO 56.0 37.4 KZN 55.6 49.3 BOM 19.1 72.9 CMB 7.2 79.9 HKG 22.3 113.9 DEL 28.6 77.1 BLR 13.2 77.7 UPG -5.1 119.6 CGK -6.1 106.7 KUL 2.7 101.7 SIN 1.4 104.0 BNE -27.4 153.1 MEL -37.7 144.8 PER -31.9 116.0 SYD -33.9 151.2 PEK 40.1 116.6 CAN 23.4 113.3 SZX 22.6 113.8 KMG 25.1 102.9 XMN 24.5 118.1 HGH 30.2 120.4 SHA 31.2 121.3 CTU 30.6 103.9 PVG 31.1 121.8 BOS 42.4 -71.0 PHX 33.4 -112.0 SFO 37.6 -122.4 LAX 33.9 -118.4 EWR 40.7 -74.2 DCA 38.9 -77.0 FLL 26.1 -80.2 SLC 40.8 -112.0 IAH 30.0 -95.3 MIA 25.8 -80.3 SEA 47.4 -122.3 DTW 42.2 -83.4 TPA 28.0 -82.5 DFW 32.9 -97.0 ATL 33.6 -84.4 LGA 40.8 -73.9 IAD 38.9 -77.5 SAN 32.7 -117.2 MDW 41.8 -87.8 DEN 39.9 -104.7 PHL 39.9 -75.2 JFK 40.6 -73.8 ORD 42.0 -87.9 BWI 39.2 -76.7 MSP 44.9 -93.2 CLT 35.2 -80.9 LAS 36.1 -115.2 MCO 28.4 -81.3 BKK 13.7 100.7 ICN 37.5 126.5 ATH 37.9 23.9 EZE -34.8 -58.5 PMI 39.6 2.7 DME 55.4 37.9 NBO -1.3 36.9 DOH 25.3 51.6 DSS 14.7 -17.1 IST 41.3 28.8",a)

  n=split("KEF 64.0 -22.6 YQX 48.9 -54.6 YVR 49.2 -123.2 YYC 51.1 -114.0 YYZ 43.7 -79.6 LOS 6.6 3.3 TUN 36.9 10.2 BRU 50.9 4.5 FRA 50.0 8.6 DUS 51.3 6.8 MUC 48.4 11.8 TXL 52.6 13.3 HEL 60.3 25.0 MAN 53.4 -2.3 LGW 51.1 -0.2 LHR 51.5 -0.5 STN 51.9 0.2 AMS 52.3 4.8 DUB 53.4 -6.3 CPH 55.6 12.7 OSL 60.1 11.1 KRK 50.1 19.8 ARN 59.7 17.9 JNB -26.1 28.2 LAD -8.9 13.2 LPA 27.9 -15.4 CMN 33.4 -7.6 ADD 9.0 38.8 CAI 30.1 31.4 BCN 41.3 2.1 MAD 40.5 -3.6 CDG 49.0 2.5 ORY 48.7 2.4 CTA 37.5 15.1 MXP 45.6 8.7 FCO 41.8 12.2 MLA 35.9 14.5 VIE 48.1 16.6 LIS 38.8 -9.1 ZRH 47.5 8.5 AYT 36.9 30.8 MEX 19.4 -99.1 APW -13.8 -172.0 AKL -37.0 174.8 JED 21.7 39.2 RUH 25.0 46.7 DXB 25.3 55.4 GUM 13.5 144.8 TPE 25.1 121.2 NRT 35.8 140.4 CTS 42.8 141.7 FUK 33.6 130.5 HND 35.6 139.8 CJU 33.5 126.5 GMP 37.6 126.8 MNL 14.5 121.0 AEP -34.6 -58.4 USH -54.8 -68.3 BSB -15.9 -47.9 GIG -22.8 -43.3 GRU -23.4 -46.5 CGH -23.6 -46.7 SCL -33.4 -70.8 IPC -27.2 -109.4 BOG 4.7 -74.1 LIM -12.0 -77.1 MVD -34.8 -56.0 CCS 10.6 -67.0 VVO 43.4 132.1 IEV 50.4 30.5 LED 59.8 30.3 SVO 56.0 37.4 KZN 55.6 49.3 BOM 19.1 72.9 CMB 7.2 79.9 HKG 22.3 113.9 DEL 28.6 77.1 BLR 13.2 77.7 UPG -5.1 119.6 CGK -6.1 106.7 KUL 2.7 101.7 SIN 1.4 104.0 BNE -27.4 153.1 MEL -37.7 144.8 PER -31.9 116.0 SYD -33.9 151.2 PEK 40.1 116.6 CAN 23.4 113.3 SZX 22.6 113.8 KMG 25.1 102.9 XMN 24.5 118.1 HGH 30.2 120.4 SHA 31.2 121.3 CTU 30.6 103.9 PVG 31.1 121.8 BOS 42.4 -71.0 PHX 33.4 -112.0 SFO 37.6 -122.4 LAX 33.9 -118.4 EWR 40.7 -74.2 DCA 38.9 -77.0 FLL 26.1 -80.2 SLC 40.8 -112.0 IAH 30.0 -95.3 MIA 25.8 -80.3 SEA 47.4 -122.3 DTW 42.2 -83.4 TPA 28.0 -82.5 DFW 32.9 -97.0 ATL 33.6 -84.4 LGA 40.8 -73.9 IAD 38.9 -77.5 HNL 21.3 -157.9 SAN 32.7 -117.2 MDW 41.8 -87.8 DEN 39.9 -104.7 PHL 39.9 -75.2 ANC 61.2 -150.0 JFK 40.6 -73.8 ORD 42.0 -87.9 BWI 39.2 -76.7 MSP 44.9 -93.2 CLT 35.2 -80.9 LAS 36.1 -115.2 MCO 28.4 -81.3 BKK 13.7 100.7 ICN 37.5 126.5 ATH 37.9 23.9 EZE -34.8 -58.5 PMI 39.6 2.7 DRW -12.4 130.9 DME 55.4 37.9 NBO -1.3 36.9 DOH 25.3 51.6 HLE -16.0 -5.6 DSS 14.7 -17.1 IST 41.3 28.8",a)


  #printf("%dx%d", W, H);
  
  split("", m);
   
  for (i=1;i<=n;i += 3) {
    py=int(H-(a[i+1]+LAT)/LAT2*H);
    px=int(((a[i+2]+180+t)%360)/360*W);
    m[py " " px] = a[i];
    #printf(" %s %d %d",a[i], py, px);
  }
  i=0;

#  while (i<W*H-1) {
#    x=i%W; y=int(i/W);
#    k=y " " x;
#    if(k in m) {
#      printf("%s", m[k]);
#      i+=3;
#    } else {
#      printf(" ");
#      i+=1;
#    }
#  }
  
  e="";
  while (i<W*H-1) {
    x=i%W; y=int(i/W);
    k=y " " x;
    if(k in m) {
      e = e "\033[37m" m[k] "\033[32m";
      i+=3;
    } else {
      if (k in wm) { e = e ":" ;} else { e = e " ";}
      i+=1;
    }
  }
  printf("%s", e);


}

BEGIN {


  nw=split("-75 -146 11113T3223111T32112T42212S1792 -74 -138 7131318141135T36111T442S1793 -73 -127 4121241914414141512151171T432S181111 -72 -103 861T1441351T464T78211T982 -71 -102 3712229T4512125111211926311311112751112T24121T18235T10215 11 -86 487T51421112135T10171936335T231T2223111229115 12 -87 221T11111T52216314351326292116442T22141T18541T12222 13 -91 -159 1T4822271T128T60112T111T141T10131213121T1513191T18651166342 23 -110 221T23321T60213T2111111T19121T131211282T191242261T11121 24 -112 32191T182T611215111T123T252T117T10221T1612431T19112 25 -112 4T582111222T50414125652T10392613111T1821341133135714171T12112 51 -127 1T471T204T4522336727832T1411111111211T18121T1311211T17151T13211T12111 52 -132 21111T45121T221T45121113241718164T262T361T21141T15111T141 53 -133 221T461T252T4512113113113518262T271T12221T43311T11222T12141 54 -164 2T294T47121T211T486127715121142T29131212321T5821221T17111 55 -163 6T263T4131232T162T5169511623212T382T84151 56 -160 1111111T212T412T111T141T54221911111125512S126162 57 -158 7T182T39111T131T70311844147S1101T17152 58 -161 11322T155T382T1427431T563711221425221S12325131 59 -166 2145124412313T561T11111T67142T107S11312122112241221131 60 -167 4T11222112112T441T1617141T1511112T5414222111112S130231211111 61 -166 2T141T692711121T16161T45162413181S1251212292 62 -169 132T7011261151524T15161T461T1113191S1312T12111 63 -171 435T691211213722131T12191T18123T2412171127161S1401 64 -180 1445115T7042412227111T101T111T1611161T23112712142311212S1364 65 -179 4311311T7811352124211T121T124T11111112122T2418221413123 66 -178 122214114T201T5349141112371T181T102212111T2817151316512T233 67 -174 192T47111245112117341332171T101T201T451116151T102141111T223 68 -180 121T103T262T192111112153531112131444111T132T19221T422111431T141216313116232T941T101 69 -163 2T17111123212113511131151112216111232121491T115T241T43332121321T231221332T85211121121211121 70 -180 111T1643312111111T133224771111111114113816122T12211T246T411112222T21122815111T561T20152T1017111 71 -180 211T202T291112212713133121222T13111T163T27121T45131T2211111T10111231241T462221113T10161T20111 72 -125 153211211111121111115114146T192T293T72221T13121121112T421519281 73 -124 263552313431311111111T191T32211T72211T121T101111111T2521122311211T10212 74 -124 122213221912522112113T211T35111T73121T271T222T27111312111 75 -121 13243132111131321121113T211T372T731113121T222111131T153T212721111",w);
  for (t=0;t<360;++t) {
  #for (t=0;t<1;++t) {
    globe(t,w,nw);
    system("sleep 0.1");
  }
  
}
